name: LordoftheLores
0:
”Alexa ask lord of the lores to tell me a lord of the rings fact.”
”Alexa open Lord of the Lores.”
”Alexa ask Lord of the Lores to tell me a fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lord of the lores
des: Some facts from the Lord of the Rings trilogy and the Silmarillion will be displayed when invocation. These facts are random, be sure to ask several questions!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
